ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure

Class StructureDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.lis.wingj.structure.StructureDetector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmbryoStructureDetector, WPouchStructureDetector

    public abstract class StructureDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for implementing a morphological structure detector.

    This class provides method to run a structure detection. The detection is composed of different detection modules run one after another in a specific order defined in the class extending this class.

    The method runAll() runs all modules one after another. step() runs only one module before stopping. pause() stops the detection at the first occasion when pressed after runAll() or resume(). resume() is used to resume the automatic detection after having paused it. step() runs a single detection module. abort() cancels the current detection. A new detection can be run abort() with runAll() or step().

    Version:
    October 10, 2012
    Author:
    Thomas Schaffter (thomas.schaff...@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Structure, StructureSnake, StructureDetectionModule

    • Method Detail

      • runEarlyPreProcessing

        public abstract void runEarlyPreProcessing()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs the early pre-processing method. IMPORTANT: This method is called when pressing on "Pre-Process". Should be used only to set variables in WJSettings because the detector instance calling this method will not be the same as the effective structure detector. For other processing, consider implementing it as a detection module.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
